settings.title: Support Made Simple

settings.custom_liquid:
<iframe
  title="trackpage"
  style="width: 100%"
  id="yq-tracking-page"
  src="https://shopify-proxy.17track.net/iframe?shop=cngunn-h8"
  scrolling="no" 
  frameBorder="0"
/><script>
  // resize iframe to fit content
  const iframe = document.querySelector("#yq-tracking-page");
  window.addEventListener("message", (event) => {
    if (
      event.data &&
      event.data.type === "resize" &&
      typeof event.data.scrollHeight === "number" &&
      iframe
    ) {
      iframe.style.height = event.data.scrollHeight + "px";
    }
  });
</script>

settings.title: What makes Siluet reformers different from other home Pilates equipment?
settings.content:
Siluet Reformers are the only Pilates reformers specifically made for your home!

We blend luxurious design, studio-quality performance, convenience, and most importantly, safety.

Each reformer is handcrafted with premium materials and engineered for home use, so you get professional Pilates without leaving your living room.

settings.title: Which reformer model is right for me?
settings.content:
Elevé: Compact, foldable, perfect for tight spaces, ideal for convenient everyday use

Elevé Studio: Permanent, studio-grade reformer with built-in tower, best if you're seeking a full Pilates studio experience at home

settings.title: What Pilates skill level is required for Siluet reformers?
settings.content: Our reformers are beginner-friendly and suitable for all skill levels, from first-timers to seasoned practitioners.

settings.title: What gifts and accessories come with the Elevé Reformer?
settings.content:
You’ll receive your complimentary Siluet Era Kit (Pilates Ball, Pilates Circle, Grip Socks) separately before your reformer arrives.

Your Elevé Reformer ships with a Jumpboard and Pilates Box included.

settings.title: Product Information
Will the Elevé Reformer fit comfortably in my home?
settings.content: Yes! The Elevé Reformer is specifically engineered for home use. It’s compact and foldable, measuring only 49.6" (L) x 27.5" (W) x 22.8" (H) when folded, so it easily stores away when not in use.

settings.title: How much space do I need for the Elevé Studio Reformer?
settings.content: The Elevé Studio Reformer is thoughtfully designed for permanent setups, measuring 91" (L) x 25.5" (W), with an 83.5" tall integrated tower. We recommend dedicating at least a 10' x 6' space to fully enjoy your workouts.

settings.title: Are Siluet reformers easy to move or store?
settings.content:
Yes! Both the Elevé and Elevé Studio Reformers feature integrated wheels, allowing easy movement around your home.

The Elevé folds quickly for compact storage, while the Studio model is ideal for dedicated spaces.

settings.title: Sizing & Space
Can I really try the Elevé Risk-Free For 60 Days?!
settings.content:
Yes. You have 60 days from delivery to try your reformer at home. Open box returns are allowed. If it is not a fit, we arrange pickup and issue a refund after inspection.

Policy Here

settings.title: Where does Siluet ship to?
settings.content: We currently ship all throughout the United States (excluding P.O. Boxes and military addresses)

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my reformer?
settings.content:
Elevé Reformer: Typically arrives within 8–10 weeks (4–5 weeks crafting + 4–5 weeks delivery).

Elevé Studio Reformer: Typically arrives within 9–11 weeks (5–6 weeks crafting + 4–5 weeks premium delivery).

settings.title: Can I track my shipment?
settings.content:
Absolutely! You'll receive a tracking number as soon as your reformer ships, so you can easily monitor its progress.

You can also track your shipment on this page.

settings.title: Do I need to be home to receive my reformer?
settings.content: Yes, someone needs to be home to assist in receiving the reformer, especially due to its size and premium delivery requirements.

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
How difficult is it to assemble a Siluet reformer?
settings.content: Assembly directions are straightforward and beginner-friendly, no technical skills are required. Most customers set up either reformer within 15–20 minutes.

settings.title: Are there assembly instructions or videos?
settings.content: Yes! Clear step-by-step instructions and video tutorials are provided to guide you smoothly through assembly.

settings.title: Assembly & Setup
What payment options does Siluet offer?
settings.content: We accept all major credit cards, HSA/FSA, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Shop Pay, and convenient monthly financing.

settings.title: Do you offer financing or installment plans?
settings.content: Yes! You can finance your Elevé Reformer for as low as $97/month, or your Elevé Studio starting at $388/month.

settings.title: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
settings.content: Orders can be modified or canceled within 48 hours of placement. After that period, contact our support team, and we'll assist you promptly.

settings.title: Orders & Payments
Are Siluet reformers safe for postpartum use?
settings.content: Yes! Siluet reformers offer gentle yet effective resistance, ideal for postpartum recovery. Always consult your doctor before starting any new exercise program.

settings.title: Can I use the reformer if I have existing injuries or medical conditions?
settings.content:
Our reformers offer controlled, low-impact movements suitable for rehabilitation or managing conditions.

Pilates itself has been curing injuries for centuries!

settings.title: Do you have recommendations for safely getting started with Pilates at home?
settings.content:
Yes, we provide a complimentary guided 30-day program designed for beginners. It ensures safe and effective Pilates sessions right from day one.

Additionally, our reforms are sturdy and of the highest quality, ensuring a calm and safe Pilates experience.

settings.title: Safety & Health

settings.text:
If you haven't found the answer to your query in the above FAQs, we have further information about Siluet  available at any time at our support email or number:

support@shopsiluet.com
